entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 11:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
